title: Wear Timer
summary: Simple and functional timer for Android Wear with two different time pickers.
description: - Two different time pickers- Automatically remembers which picker you use- Screen stays on unless user swipes away- Voice enabled- App opens from notification with one click- Remembers last set time after stop- Standalone; no need to be connected to phone
descriptionHTML:
- Two different time pickers
- Automatically remembers which picker you use
- Screen stays on unless user swipes away
- Voice enabled
- App opens from notification with one click
- Remembers last set time after stop
- Standalone; no need to be connected to phone
comments: Does not save previous time Doesn't save the last time so it's no better than the stock timer
